name: 单体火系攻击
description: 单体技能,对对方造成本体生命值40%的伤害

name: AOE水系攻击
description: AOE技能对所有地方造成本体生命值25%的伤害.

name: Mend Wounds
description: Magically seals a target's injuries, restoring health.

name: Inferno
description: Engulfs all non-metallic enemies in a sea of flames.

name: Stone Shield
description: Forms a temporary barrier of rock that blocks one normal attack.

name: Golden Judgment
description: Calls down a bolt of energy on one opponent.

name: Forest's Fury
description: Vines erupt from the ground, lashing at all enemies.
